name: André Lotterer
status: Competing in FIA World Endurance Championship
introduction: Andr Lotterer (born 19 November 1981 in Duisburg, North Rhine-Westphalia, West Germany) is a German racing driver.  He served as a Jaguar test driver from 2002 and 2003 and drove for Caterham at the 2014 Belgian Grand Prix.
